00129 //inline functions: ************************************************************************

00131 
00132 inline ULong64_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::BitConcat(UShort_t lo, UShort_t mid, UShort_t hi)
00133 //Concatenates 16 bit high, middle, and low words to form a ULong64_t
00134 { 
00135   return ((ULong64_t)(lo) +  (((ULong64_t)(mid)) << 16) + (((ULong64_t)(hi)) << 32));  
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 //functions that return data from buffer header: *********************************************
00140 
00141 
00142 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufNData() //returns number of 16bit words in buffer
00143 { 
00144   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2))); 
00145 }       
00146 
00147 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufModNum() //returns module number
00148 {  
00149   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2) + 1)); 
00150 } 
00151 
00152 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetRunTask() //returns data format
00153 { 
00154   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2) + 2) % 0x1000); 
00155 } 
00156 
00157 inline ULong64_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufTime() 
00158 //returns run start time
00159 {
00160   return BitConcat(GetBufTimeLo(), GetBufTimeMid(), GetBufTimeHi()); 
00161 }
00162 
00163 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufTimeLo() 
00164 //returns low word of run start time
00165 { 
00166   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2) + 5)); 
00167 }
00168 
00169 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufTimeMid() 
00170 //returns middle word of run start time
00171 { 
00172   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2) + 4)); 
00173 }
00174 
00175 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetBufTimeHi() 
00176 //returns high word of run start time
00177 { 
00178   return (*((UShort_t*) (fDataRecord+2) + 3)); 
00179 }

00185 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsStdListMode() { return (GetRunTask() == kStd); }
00186 
00187 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeC1() { return (GetRunTask() == kC1); }
00188 
00189 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeC2() { return (GetRunTask() == kC2); }
00190 
00191 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeC3() { return (GetRunTask() == kC3); }
00192 
00193 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsStdFastListMode() { return (GetRunTask() == kStdFast); }
00194 
00195 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsFastListModeC1() { return (GetRunTask() == kFastC1); }
00196 
00197 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsFastListModeC2() { return (GetRunTask() == kFastC2); }
00198 
00199 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsFastListModeC3() { return (GetRunTask() == kFastC3); }
00200 
00201 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeAnyStdC1()
00202 {
00203   return ( IsStdListMode() || IsStdFastListMode() || IsListModeC1() 
00204     || IsFastListModeC1() ); 
00205 }
00206 
00207 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeAnyC2()
00208 {
00209   return ( IsListModeC2() || IsFastListModeC2() ); 
00210 }
00211 
00212 inline bool ORDGF4cEventDecoder::IsListModeAnyC3()
00213 {
00214   return ( IsListModeC3() || IsFastListModeC3() );
00215 }

00218 //event functions: ***********************************************************************

00220 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFEventLen(size_t iEvent)  
00221 //returns length of iEvent event, including header
00222 {
00223   if (iEvent < GetDGFNEvents() - 1) return fEventPtrs[iEvent + 1] - fEventPtrs[iEvent];
00224   return fEventPtrs[0] + GetBufNData() - kBufHeadLen - fEventPtrs[iEvent];
00225 }
00226 
00227 inline UInt_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFEventTime(size_t iEvent)
00228 //returns event start time
00229 {
00230   return (UInt_t) (BitConcat(GetDGFEventTimeLo(iEvent),
00231     GetDGFEventTimeHi(iEvent)));  
00232 } 
00233 
00234 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFNEvents() { return fEventPtrs.size(); }
00235 
00236 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFEventHitPattern(size_t iEvent)
00237 //returns low word of event time
00238 { 
00239   return fEventPtrs[iEvent][0]; 
00240 }
00241 
00242 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFEventTimeLo(size_t iEvent)
00243 //returns low word of event time
00244 { 
00245   return fEventPtrs[iEvent][2]; 
00246 }
00247 
00248 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetDGFEventTimeHi(size_t iEvent)
00249 //returns high word of event time
00250 { 
00251   return fEventPtrs[iEvent][1]; 
00252 }

00255 //channel functions: **********************************************************************

00257 
00258 inline const UShort_t* ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetChannelPointer(size_t iEvent, size_t iChannel) 
00259 {
00260   return fChannelPtrs[fEventPtrs[iEvent]][iChannel];
00261 }
00262 
00263 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetNChannels(size_t iEvent)          
00264 //returns number of channels for the current event, unless another event is specified
00265 {  
00266   return fChannelPtrs[fEventPtrs[iEvent]].size();
00267 }
00268 
00269 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetChanNData(size_t iEvent, size_t iChannel)
00270 {
00271   if (IsListModeAnyC2() || IsListModeAnyC3()) return GetChanHeadLen();
00272   return GetChannelPointer(iEvent,iChannel)[0];
00273 }
00274 
00275 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetChannelNumber(size_t iEvent, size_t iChannel) 
00276 //returns the channel number of the ith channel that was read out, where i = iChannel
00277 {
00278   return fChannelNumbers[fEventPtrs[iEvent]][iChannel];
00279 }
00280 
00281 inline const UShort_t* ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetWaveformDataPointer(size_t iEvent, size_t iChannel)
00282 {
00283   return GetChannelPointer(iEvent, iChannel) + GetChanHeadLen();;
00284 }
00285 
00286 inline ULong64_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetEventTime(size_t event) 
00287 {
00288   return (ULong64_t) GetDGFEventTime(fEventVector[event].first);
00289 }
00290 
00291 inline UInt_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetEventEnergy(size_t event) 
00292 {
00293   return GetChanEnergy(fEventVector[event].first, fEventVector[event].second);
00294 }
00295 
00296 inline UShort_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetEventChannel(size_t event) 
00297 {
00298   return GetChannelNumber(fEventVector[event].first, fEventVector[event].second);
00299 }
00300 
00301 inline size_t ORDGF4cEventDecoder::GetEventWaveformLength(size_t event) 
00302 {
00303   return GetWaveformLen(fEventVector[event].first, fEventVector[event].second);
00304 }
